author: hbjydev
body:
I tried running `yay -S powershell --aur`, and this happened.

```zsh

➜ yay -S powershell --aur
```

comments.author: hbjydev
comments.body: Fixed it. I had to go into `/etc/locale.gen` and uncomment the `en_US.UTF-8` line. Then run `sudo locale-gen` and run `yay -S powershell --aur` again and it goes through.

comments.author: hbjydev
comments.body: (credit to AUR and `GNU/Darwin` on the MS Discord)

title: Installing on Arch/Manjaro via AUR leads to build errors
